   elevated troponin, and temporal symptoms x3 weeks, likely patient had
   acute ACS event a few weeks ago. Troponins are now down-trending.

   main stenosis. Awaiting CABG.

   evidence of both right and left sided heart failure. Received 60 mg of

   also worsen pulmonary hypertension.  Another source of pulmonary

   lung with sufficient nodularity to raise concern for lymphangitic

   to related to heart failure and bowel congestion, especially given her
   elevated PA pressure.

   - encourage smoking cessation

   - monitor pt on telemetry

   exam.
   - treat CHF as above
